about_the_game: Demo of the game Kill Invaders, in this version you have 2 maps to play, in the demo you don't level up but you can play against other players and enter their rooms, you can play other maps if you enter the room of someone who has already released the map .
detailed_description: Demo of the game Kill Invaders, in this version you have 2 maps to play, in the demo you don't level up but you can play against other players and enter their rooms, you can play other maps if you enter the room of someone who has already released the map .
name: Kill Invaders Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
